name: Police Escape Prison Chase 3D
description:
A thief should sit in jail – you have to prevent prison escape as a policeman! You are the chief guardian of some big prison, and today you got to know that all the prisoners are going to escape the prison. That would be a terrible disaster both for prison and citizens, so prison director gave you a command – you have to prevent this escape. Police Escape Prison Chase 3D – stop well planned escape!

Ex-prisoners will be running past you, and your goal is to catch them all. There will be few waves – catch as much as you can. Don’t worry if you miss some one – police will catch them later – but you have to stop most of the prisoners. Be quick and careful, good luck you!

POLICE ESCAPE PRISON CHASE 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Prison escape simulation 3D;
- Real police chase;
- A lot of escapee – train your reaction;
- Easy-to-use controls;
- Great graphics and sounds.

Your mission is about to start – can you hear the warning siren? Police Escape Prison Chase 3D – show who is the boss in the prison!
